```{r}
library(quantmod)
library(TTR)

getSymbols("AAPL", src = "yahoo")
getSymbols("MSFT", src = "yahoo")
AAPLClosePrice <- as.vector(AAPL$AAPL.Close)
MSFTClosePrice <- as.vector(MSFT$MSFT.Close)

chartSeries(to.weekly(AAPL['2016::2018']), theme = "white")
plot(AAPLClosePrice,MSFTClosePrice)
```
